trans-unit.source: Enables enumeration of components at design time.
trans-unit.target: 在設計階段啟用元件的列舉。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDiscoveryService> interface enables design-time enumeration of components in the Toolbox.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDiscoveryService>介面可讓在工具箱中元件的設計階段列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: You could provide a custom implementation that enumerates across other types available at design time.
trans-unit.target: 您可以提供自訂的實作，可在設計階段使用的其他型別列舉。

trans-unit.source: For example, your implementation could enumerate the components that are present in a particular designer.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您的實作無法列舉有特定的設計工具中的元件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDiscoveryService> to find all the types that derive from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDiscoveryService>衍生自的所有類型中找出<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>型別。

trans-unit.source: The designer host providing design-time services.
trans-unit.target: 提供設計階段服務的設計工具主應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The base type specifying the components to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 指定要擷取之元件的基底型別 (Base Type)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of available component types.
trans-unit.target: 取得可用元件型別的清單。

trans-unit.source: The list of available component types.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDiscoveryService.GetComponentTypes%2A> method retrieves the list of available component types, which are types implementing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDiscoveryService.GetComponentTypes%2A>方法會擷取可用的元件類型，也就是類型的清單實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>介面。

trans-unit.source: If the `baseType` parameter is `null`, all components are retrieved; otherwise, only component types derived from `baseType` are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`baseType`參數是`null`，擷取所有的元件; 否則只有元件型別衍生自`baseType`會傳回。

trans-unit.source: When you pass in a value for the `designerHost` parameter, type resolution is scoped to `designerHost`.
trans-unit.target: 當您要傳入的值`designerHost`參數，型別解析範圍為`designerHost`。

trans-unit.source: This means that if there is a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> whose type is on disk, and not in the global assembly cache, its type will fail to load through `designerHost`.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，如果沒有<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>其型別是在磁碟上，且不在全域組件快取中，其型別將無法透過載入`designerHost`。

trans-unit.source: If you pass in `null` for `designerHost`, it returns all types that can be queried from the global assembly cache or the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要傳入`null`如`designerHost`，它會傳回可以從全域組件快取查詢的所有型別或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDiscoveryService.GetComponentTypes%2A> method to find all the types that derive from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDiscoveryService.GetComponentTypes%2A>方法來尋找所有型別衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>型別。
